definitions.text: a special group delegated to consider some matter;  - Milton Berle
examples: a committee is a group that keeps minutes and loses hours

definitions.text: a fee for services rendered based on a percentage of an amount received or collected or agreed to be paid (as distinguished from a salary)
the act of granting authority to undertake certain functions
the state of being in good working order and ready for operation
examples: the motor was out of commission

definitions.text: a group of representatives or delegates
a formal statement of a command or injunction to do something
examples: the judge's charge to the jury

definitions.text: an official document issued by a government and conferring on the recipient the rank of an officer in the armed forces
the act of committing a crime
a special assignment that is given to a person or group
examples: his charge was deliver a message

definitions.text: put into commission; equip for service; of ships
